title: Dress Up Your Teddy
description: Naomi's not sure how she feels about her recent booty call. Instead of waiting for Trevor to call her, she takes the initiative and invites him out as her date for Halloween. Things get hot and heavy between them, and they keep heating up until Christmas Eve, when everything boils over.Length: 17,600 words, or 71 book pages long. This is the third and final story in a 3-part series.Spice Level: Erotic and romantic. This story contains super-hot sex, M/F. For adults, 18+ only.
author: Mimi Strong
